channel.title: Cinderella on Peyton Kort Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cinderella on Peyton Kort Blog

item.title: Can you predict a Cinderella team?
item.description: Teams like VCU and UCLA have had incredible runs in March. Back in 2011, VCU made it all the way to the Final Four as an 11 seed, and having to play in the First Four. UCLA this year has made that exact same run. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.5 ✓ dplyr 1.0.4 ## ✓ tidyr 1.
